rubypresent.name: Ruby Present
rubypresent.event: var rubyItem = Math.random();if(rubyItem < 0.1){var rubyItemToGive = 'simplerubybow';}else if(rubyItem < 0.2){var rubyItemToGive = 'advancedrubybow';}else if(rubyItem < 0.3){var rubyItemToGive = 'simplerubysword';}else if(rubyItem < 0.4){var rubyItemToGive = 'advancedrubysword';}else if(rubyItem < 0.5){var rubyItemToGive = 'simplerubystaff';}else if(rubyItem < 0.6){var rubyItemToGive = 'advancedrubystaff';}else if(rubyItem < 0.7){var rubyItemToGive = 'rubyarmor';}else if(rubyItem < 0.733){var rubyItemToGive = 'rubyhelmet';}else if(rubyItem < 0.766){var rubyItemToGive = 'rubyhood';}else if(rubyItem < 0.8){var rubyItemToGive = 'rubyhat';}else if(rubyItem < 0.9){var rubyItemToGive = 'rubyboots';}else{var rubyItemToGive = 'rubyglove';}if(self.inventory.items[index].stack === 1){self.inventory.items[index] = {};}else{self.inventory.items[index].stack -= 1;}self.inventory.addItem(rubyItemToGive,1,[]);self.inventory.refreshItem(index);
rubypresent.description: Gives you a random ruby item.

anniversarypresent.name: Anniversary Present
anniversarypresent.event: var anniversaryItem = Math.random();if(anniversaryItem < 0.25){var anniversaryItemToGive = 'goldensaber';}else if(anniversaryItem < 0.5){var anniversaryItemToGive = 'goldenbow';}else if(anniversaryItem < 0.75){var anniversaryItemToGive = 'bookofgold';}else{var anniversaryItemToGive = 'goldenscepter';}if(self.inventory.items[index].stack === 1){self.inventory.items[index] = {};}else{self.inventory.items[index].stack -= 1;}self.inventory.addItem(anniversaryItemToGive,1,[]);self.inventory.refreshItem(index);

lesserrandomboostpotion.name: Lesser Random Boost Potion
lesserrandomboostpotion.event: var debuff = Math.random();if(debuff < 0.15){var debuffToGive = 'lesserhealthboost';}else if(debuff < 0.3){var debuffToGive = 'lesserdefenseboost';}else if(debuff < 0.45){var debuffToGive = 'lesserspeedboost';}else if(debuff < 0.6){var debuffToGive = 'lessermanaboost';}else if(debuff < 0.75){var debuffToGive = 'lesserregenboost';}else if(debuff < 0.875){var debuffToGive = 'lesserrandomboost1';}else{var debuffToGive = 'lesserrandomboost2';}self.addDebuff(debuffToGive,14400);if(self.inventory.items[index].stack === 1){self.inventory.items[index] = {};}else{self.inventory.items[index].stack -= 1;}self.inventory.refreshItem(index);
lesserrandomboostpotion.description: Grants a random lesser potion buff.

manaboostpotion.name: Mana Boost Potion
manaboostpotion.description:
Increases max mana by 120.
Increases mana regen by 100%.

randomboostpotion.name: Random Boost Potion
randomboostpotion.event: var debuff = Math.random();if(debuff < 0.15){var debuffToGive = 'healthboost';}else if(debuff < 0.3){var debuffToGive = 'defenseboost';}else if(debuff < 0.45){var debuffToGive = 'speedboost';}else if(debuff < 0.6){var debuffToGive = 'manaboost';}else if(debuff < 0.75){var debuffToGive = 'regenboost';}else if(debuff < 0.875){var debuffToGive = 'randomboost1';}else{var debuffToGive = 'randomboost2';}self.addDebuff(debuffToGive,28800);if(self.inventory.items[index].stack === 1){self.inventory.items[index] = {};}else{self.inventory.items[index].stack -= 1;}self.inventory.refreshItem(index);

greatermanaboostpotion.name: Greater Mana Boost Potion
greatermanaboostpotion.description:

greaterrandomboostpotion.name: Greater Random Boost Potion
greaterrandomboostpotion.event: var debuff = Math.random();if(debuff < 0.15){var debuffToGive = 'greaterhealthboost';}else if(debuff < 0.3){var debuffToGive = 'greaterdefenseboost';}else if(debuff < 0.45){var debuffToGive = 'greaterspeedboost';}else if(debuff < 0.6){var debuffToGive = 'greatermanaboost';}else if(debuff < 0.75){var debuffToGive = 'greaterregenboost';}else if(debuff < 0.87){var debuffToGive = 'greaterrandomboost1';}else if(debuff < 0.99){var debuffToGive = 'greaterrandomboost2';}else{var debuffToGive = 'superrandomboost';}self.addDebuff(debuffToGive,43200);if(self.inventory.items[index].stack === 1){self.inventory.items[index] = {};}else{self.inventory.items[index].stack -= 1;}self.inventory.refreshItem(index);
greaterrandomboostpotion.description: Grants a greater random potion buff.
